title: Can I use a Google Pixel 4 (Unlocked & purchased from USA) in Sri Lanka with a local sim card ?
content:
I am about to purchase a new Pixel 4 XL (unlocked ) device from USA, but I'm planning to move to Sri Lanka so I need to check the compatibility of the device if I am to use a local career !
Network coverage in Sri Lanka (below)
GSM 900, GSM 1800 - 2G
UMTS 2100 - 3G
LTE 1800 (3), LTE 2300 (40) - 4G
